tasks.title: Finish homework
tasks.information: This homework is for my math class and is due at the beginning of class tomorrow.

tasks.title: Buy groceries
tasks.information: Make sure to buy milk, bread, and apples. Also, check for any sales or coupons before going to the store.

tasks.title: Schedule dentist appointment
tasks.information: This is a follow-up appointment to check on the progress of my teeth cleaning.

tasks.title: Go for a run
tasks.information: I like to go for a run around the neighborhood in the evenings to get some exercise and clear my mind.

tasks.title: Plan vacation
tasks.information: I want to go somewhere warm and beachy for my vacation this year. I am thinking about destinations like Hawaii or the Caribbean.
